title: Down with Wilco
text:
Down with Wilco is the fifth album by <a href="United%20States">American</a> <a href="rock%20music">rock</a> band <a href="The%20Minus%205">The Minus 5</a>. Produced by Scott McCaughey and Jeff Tweedy, it is a collaboration between McCaughey and <a href="Wilco">Wilco</a>, recorded at SOMA Studios Chicago in September and December 2001. Released on <a href="Yep%20Roc">Yep Roc</a> in 2003, it also features contributions from <a href="Peter%20Buck">Peter Buck</a> of <a href="R.E.M.%20%28band%29">R.E.M.</a>, <a href="Ken%20Stringfellow">Ken Stringfellow</a> of <a href="The%20Posies">The Posies</a>, Sean O'Hagan of <a href="The%20High%20Llamas">The High Llamas</a>, with Jessy Greene providing strings. The double-vinyl version adds five songs not included on the CD.
Track listing.
All songs written by <a href="Scott%20McCaughey">Scott McCaughey</a>, except as indicated.
Personnel.
The Minus 5
Additional musicians
